channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Gives Netflix Its First Box-Office Win
item.description: 🎶 Netflix strikes box-office gold with 'KPop Demon Hunters'! 🌟 Who's ready for this epic music-filled adventure? 🔥 #Netflix #KPopDemonHunters

item.title: Fans Choose Stray Kids’ ‘KARMA’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🌟 Stray Kids' 'KARMA' is our jam of the week! 🎶 Did your fave make the cut? #StrayKids #NewMusicMonday

item.title: Vampire Weekend Call Out Victorious Festival Organizers After Mary Wallopers Set Cut Short
item.description: Vampire Weekend bringing the sass! 🎶 Who else vibing with this energy? 💥 #MusicDrama #VampireWeekend

item.title: Deftones pay tribute to Brent Hinds, debut ‘private music’ songs in Vancouver
item.description: 🎸 Deftones rockin' it out in Vancouver with new tunes dedicated to Brent Hinds! 🤘🎶 #MusicNews #Deftones #RockOn

item.title: Watch Neil Young Play “Long Walk Home” For The First Time In 36 Years
item.description: 🎸 Neil Young is back at it! Watch him perform "Long Walk Home" after 36 years! 🎶 #NeilYoung #LongWalkHome
